message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident will bring you a lot of value. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12000?

I understand that $12000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can sell the product to you for $13500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $13500 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $12500?

I'm willing to make one more concession, but I think $12500 is getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. I can sell the product to you for $13000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
